fields.request: Manual QA: Validate related models relationship badges
fields.request_details:
1. From the Customer Accounts admin changelist, scroll to the Related Models section below the table.
2. Confirm each related model pill includes a relationship indicator (for example, 1:1, N:1, N:N).
3. Verify the indicators align with the relationships: Users shows 1:1, Energy Tariffs shows N:1, and RFIDs shows N:N.
4. Open a Customer Account change form and confirm the Related Models section renders the same relationship badges.
